Class EDFInfoPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JEditorPane
              • javax.swing.JTextPane
                • editor.EDFInfoPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class EDFInfoPane
extends javax.swing.JTextPane
    This class is to customize the layout of info panes including the file information pane, the log pane, and the message pane To be customized items: foreground/background color/font, keyword color/font, plain text color/font, and so on.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
